::Firearm::

Firearm looks back at Spears, sighing. He wished he knew how to 
comfort her, but he didn't.

He stops at a door, pressing a button. The door slides open to reveal 
a well furnished room.

"You can use these quarters if you want. Is there anything else I can 
do for you?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> She followed him, tears still running down her cheeks. She muttered 
> as she walked, still dazed. Mutters,"just kill me and getit over 
> with..with out Striker, it's not worth it."
> She whispered Striker's name over and over. Her spark not wanting 
to 
> believe he was gone.
